recipes.name: Health Elixir
recipes.description: Two potions rendered down into something stronger. The colour is wrong, but the effect is not.

result.name: Health Elixir
result.description: Two potions rendered down into something stronger. The colour is wrong, but the effect is not.

recipes.name: Reinforced Sword
recipes.description: The iron has been retempered and the edge reground. It bites deeper now.

result.name: Reinforced Sword
result.description: The iron has been retempered and the edge reground. It bites deeper now.

recipes.name: Reinforced Armor
recipes.description: Extra plates riveted over the weak points. Heavier, but considerably harder to kill through.

result.name: Reinforced Armor
result.description: Extra plates riveted over the weak points. Heavier, but considerably harder to kill through.

recipes.name: Strong Antidote
recipes.description: Two antidotes distilled into a concentrated cure. Ends poison entirely and restores a little vitality.

result.name: Strong Antidote
result.description: Two antidotes distilled into a concentrated cure. Ends poison entirely and restores a little vitality.

recipes.name: Elixir of Strength
recipes.description: Ancient runes fused with a restorative tonic. The result is something that permanently sharpens the arm.

result.name: Elixir of Strength
result.description: Ancient runes fused with a restorative tonic. The result is something that permanently sharpens the arm.

recipes.name: Chain Vest
recipes.description: Chainmail reinforced with a helm's iron plates at the shoulders and chest. Protection with room to breathe.

result.name: Chain Vest
result.description: Chainmail reinforced with a helm's iron plates at the shoulders and chest. Protection with room to breathe.

recipes.name: Poison Blade
recipes.description: The antidote's toxin-base was drawn off and applied to the blade. It knows exactly where it hurts.

result.name: Poison Blade
result.description: The antidote's toxin-base was drawn off and applied to the blade. It knows exactly where it hurts.

recipes.name: Restoration Draught
recipes.description: Healing and mana combined into one unstable compound. Unpleasant to drink. Very good for you.

result.name: Restoration Draught
result.description: Healing and mana combined into one unstable compound. Unpleasant to drink. Very good for you.

recipes.name: Reinforced Helm
recipes.description: The rivets replaced, the padding relined, the cheek guards straightened. A proper helmet at last.

result.name: Reinforced Helm
result.description: The rivets replaced, the padding relined, the cheek guards straightened. A proper helmet at last.

recipes.name: Battle Tonic
recipes.description: A restorative base charged with raw arcane force. Heals and temporarily sharpens combat instincts.

result.name: Battle Tonic
result.description: A restorative base charged with raw arcane force. Heals and temporarily sharpens combat instincts.

recipes.name: Goblin Stew
recipes.description: A foul brew of goblin ear and potion reagents. Tastes terrible. Heals considerably.

result.name: Goblin Stew
result.description: A foul brew of goblin ear and potion reagents. Tastes terrible. Heals considerably.

recipes.name: Bone Powder Tonic
recipes.description: Powdered bone dissolved in water. Surprisingly effective at purging toxins.

result.name: Cleansing Salve
result.description: A thick paste that draws poison and stops bleeding. Stings badly. Works.

recipes.name: Troll's Endurance Brew
recipes.description: Troll blood rendered into a potent hardening tonic.

result.name: Stone Skin Elixir
result.description: +40% DEF for 3 turns. Your skin hardens to granite. Blows that would stagger you feel distant.

recipes.name: Wraith Cloak
recipes.description: Wraith essence bound into leather — the result slips past blades like shadow.

result.name: Shadowstep Leathers
result.description: +10 DEF, +12% dodge. Supple leather armour stitched with shadow-thread for near-silent movement.

recipes.name: Dragon Scale Armor
recipes.description: Draconic scales fused onto mithril plate. The resulting armour is near-indestructible.

result.name: Dragon Scale Armor
result.description: Mithril plate fused with draconic scales. Legendary defense and draconic resilience.

recipes.name: Sharpen Stone
recipes.description: The blade is carefully ground on the ear's rough skin. It comes away keener.

result.name: Sharpened Iron Sword
result.description: A carefully sharpened iron blade. The edge has been significantly improved.

recipes.name: Fortify Armor
recipes.description: Bone dust packed into the leather's grain reinforces it against blows.

result.name: Fortified Leather Armor
result.description: Leather packed with bone dust for improved protection.

recipes.name: Enchant Weapon
recipes.description: Wraith essence bound into the blade enchants it with spectral force.

result.name: Enchanted Silver Rapier
result.description: A silver rapier imbued with wraith essence. Strikes with ghostly precision.

recipes.name: Mithril Infusion
recipes.description: Troll blood tempers the chainmail links, making each ring harder and more resilient.

result.name: Mithril Reinforced Chainmail
result.description: Chainmail tempered with troll blood. Heavier, but far harder to pierce.

recipes.name: Forge the Deathbringer
recipes.description: Dragon scales smelted around a draconic fang. The result is a greatsword that hungers.

result.name: Infernal Greatsword
result.description: A greatsword forged from dragon parts. Each swing tears the air like a thunderclap.

recipes.name: Bind the Lich
recipes.description: A soul gem and wyvern fang bound together into a conduit of necromantic power.

result.name: Staff of Domination
result.description: A staff bound with a lich's soul. Commands the dead and obliterates the living.

recipes.name: Phoenix Rebirth
recipes.description: Three vials of wraith essence fused with a powerful pendant ignite a phoenix spark.

result.name: Amulet of the Phoenix
result.description: Holds the spark of the undying bird. Once per run, it pulls the wearer back from death's edge.

recipes.name: Shadowstalker Craft
recipes.description: Blood and shadow-treated scales combined to produce the Shadowstalker's signature garb.

result.name: Shadowstalker Garb
result.description: +10 DEF, +7% dodge. Body armour crafted for silence and speed above all else.

recipes.name: Ironclad Forge
recipes.description: Troll blood tempers mithril into the signature Ironclad breastplate.

result.name: Ironclad Chestplate
result.description: +16 DEF, +15 max HP. The centerpiece of the Ironclad set; a slab of walking fortress.

recipes.name: Arcanist Bind
recipes.description: Two vials of wraith essence bind ancient arcane knowledge into a tome-like weapon.

result.name: Arcanist's Tome
result.description: +8 ATK, +20 max mana. A living tome whose spells strike with physical force.
